alert.note: Alert for Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 6:50PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Lake County through 715 PM EDT... At 650 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mascotte. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tavares, Mascotte, Howey-In-the-hills, Lake Harris and Astatula. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!
